author: jmdupuy
title: Fall 2024 Intramural Event & Leagues
text:
Get ready for Intramural Fall Term 1 Events & Leagues!
Mark your calendars for the following important dates:
- Programs Viewable Online | August 19 @1:00 PM
- Intramural Events Open For Registration | August 21 @1:00 PM
- Intramural Leagues Open For Registration | September 4 @1:00 PM
Fall Term 1 Intramural Events & Leagues
Explore the upcoming Intramural opportunities for Term 1! Please note that due to high demand for Intramural programs, some events and leagues will sell out before the registration deadlines.
[LEAGUES] Badminton League Cross Volleyball League Dodgeball League Handley Cup Soccer League Nitobe Basketball League Point Grey Flag Football League Pickleball League SRC Futsal League Todd Ice Hockey League Ultimate League Roundnet League
Registration opens September 4, 2024!
[EVENTS] Day of the Longboat– Sept 28 & 29, 2024 Water Wars– Oct 10, 2024 Great Trek– Oct 26, 2024 Gladiator– Nov 6 & 7, 2024
- *New Event – Info Coming Soon* – Nov 28, 2024
UBC Triathlon Duathlon– Mar 8, 2025
Registration opens August 21, 2024!
Day of the LongBoat is back!
Join us on September 28 & 29, to participate in one of UBC’s most iconic tradition. This signature UBC event takes place on the shores of Jericho Beach, for the largest voyageur canoe race in the world. Your team races in either just-for-fun or competitive heats to the finish line.
